title: Kick It Up!: Adding Spice to Your Scrapbook Layouts
features: Ordinary scrapbook pages get the job done, but why stop at good when you can
? Get ready to infuse your layouts with a bit of spice and take them to the next level.

, more than 180 layouts—including 70 before-and-after pairs—show you how to take your projects up a creative notch. With ideas for backgrounds, photos, titles, embellishments and journaling, you'll never run out of clever ways to spice up scrapbook pages. Plus, a gallery of kicked-up layouts illustrates how to pull it all together to create fabulous pages.
Add flavor to your scrapbooks with:
Whether you're stuck in a creative rut, or just ready to take it to the next level, flip open
and add some spice to your life.
description: Greta Hammond is a 2008 Memory Makers Master whose work has been published extensively in Creating Keepsakes, BHG Scrapbooks, Etc. and Memory Makers. She has also been a go-to artist for Memory Makers Books; her work appears in Travel Scrapbooks, Flip, Spin & Play and 601 Great Scrapbook Ideas, to name just a few.
